attributes.action: force all religious groups and organisations which accept financial donations to provide scientifically checkable proof that their beliefs are true, and that their gods exist, if this cannot be done, then return these donations, or be prosecuted for fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of the mainstream religious superstitions have existed for well over a thousand years, ample time for their scholars and clergy to study the history, and find proofs, if they actually exist. If these proofs cannot be scientifically checked within some period, six months seems reasonable, then the monies received by these groups should be returned to the donors, or the organisations charged with fraud.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
